t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You want my mother to turn off this spell? You won't succeed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I must do my part, even if I think I'll succeed alone.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She will still fail you. You won't be able to do anything to rid yourself of this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: For the glory of the Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo, I'm convincing myself I will succeed and break this spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It's imperative I will seek a solution from her. This spell will end very soon!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm going to fail you before you have a chance to meet with her!
